original_text:
“But woe to you who are rich,
    for you have already received your comfort.
korean_text: 그러나 화 있을진저 너희 부요한 자여 너희는 너희의 위로를 이미 받았도다

sentences.original_text: But woe to you who are rich,
for you have already received your comfort.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 이미 너희의 위안을 받았음이라
